ctx: intros T F FF f g x l filterlim_f filterlim_g F_fx.
exceptions.exn: In environment T : Type F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : T -> R g : R -> R x, l : Rbar filterlim_f : filterlim f F (Rbar_locally x) filterlim_g : is_lim g x l F_fx : F (fun y : T => f y <> x) y : R -> Prop H : Rbar_locally l y Unable to unify "Rbar_locally l y" with "filtermap (fun y : T => g (f y)) F y".

original: intros T F FF f g x l filterlim_f filterlim_g F_fx. apply (filterlim_comp _ _ _ _ _ (filterlocally_finite_filter x) _ _ _ filterlim_f). - intros y H. simpl. apply H. - intros y H. simpl. apply H. - apply filterlim_id.
